mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS abilists.user_time_record ( utr_no BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, utr_kind VARCHAR(100) NULL, utr_month VARCHAR(2) NULL, utr_standard_ampm CHAR(1) NULL, utr_standard_hour VARCHAR(2) NULL, utr_start_time TIMESTAMP NULL, utr_end_time TIMESTAMP NULL, utr_work_hour INT NULL, utr_comment VARCHAR(100) NULL, utr_permit CHAR(1) NULL, utr_status VARCHAR(2) NULL, utr_delete CHAR(1) NULL, user_id VARCHAR(100) NULL, insert_time TIMESTAMP NULL, update_time TIMESTAMP NULL, PRIMARY KEY (utr_no) ) ENGINE=innoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4; CREATE INDEX idx_user_reports_user_id ON abilists.user_time_record (user_id); CREATE INDEX idx_user_reports_insert_time ON abilists.user_time_record (insert_time);
